Voronyj diagram builder for Roassal

Duration: March 2014 – August 2014

I implemented Voronyj diagram for Roassal 2. You can read more here and watch the video here.


SciSmalltalk - Solving Ordinary Differential Equations in Smalltalk

Duration: May 2013 – October 2013

I was the participant of the Google Summer of Code (GSoC). My project was SciSmalltalk - Solving Ordinary Differential Equations (ODE) in Smalltalk.

So, my main task was to write the methods for solving ODE. You can read more about this project here , or you can read more about what I did on my blog.
